content: Back to level 3 today. Another case of community spread in Auckland. Kids are well practiced at this now. Ava is already talking about her emotions, which is a big step up from the bottled she did last time. Chloe loves wearing her mask. Jeremy is.. a baby still. Kate's taking it pretty hard because it's going to add to her already stressful daily life. I'm impartial about it. It is what it is. All we can do it follow the rules and hope it doesn't last too long
